experience.name: Sofware Engineer - Go Backend

We use Go and Java programming language as our main backend language, but I focus on the Golang services.

experience.name: Sofware Engineer - Backend
description: I have experience as a back-end engineer that responsible to maintain services for API integration with more than 300 partners of Tokopedia.
We use Go programming language as our main backend stack.

experience.name: Freelance Junior Programmer
description: I used to be a freelance worker supporting a project to develop the application features alteration of Real Estate Management and Other Service (REMOTE) PELINDO III for 8 months. The application was done using C# language and work design of ASP.NET. We worked the Development Process and Support for 4 months.

Furthermore, I also used to support the information system working based on web for PDAM Magelang for more or less one month. The application was done by using Laravel framework and PHP programming language.

experience.name: Internship in Information Systems Operation Support Department
description: I did an internship for 3 months in PT. Telkom Indonesia Central Java Regional Division and DIY which located on Jl. Pahlawan 10, Semarang. I was placed on IS Operation Support department. My main jobdesk in this department was making a dashboard for monitoring and calculating the level of marketing satisfaction performance in Indihome product.

Moreover, my partner and I were worked on several projects such as making a network simulation using Cisco and practiced it to the available Cisco tools, and making an android application to support the marketing of Indihome based on the Augmented Reality technology using Unity 3D.

experience.name: Programming Language Course Assistant in Information Systems Department
description: I served as an assistant for Programming Language course for two terms in the even semester. This course is about the general programming basics for the first year students. The course assistant roles are giving lab work, assessing quizzes and examinations of the students.

experience.name: Web Based Programming Course Assistant in Information Systems Department
description: I served as an assistant of Web Based Programming course for one term in the even semester. This course is about the basic concept of web and the development of web based application with PHP programming language for the second year students. In this course, the assistant lectures abit about the use of Codeigniter 3 framework. The course assistant roles are arranging module, giving lab work, and assessing the assignments.

experience.name: Algorithm and Data Structure Course Assistant in Information Systems Department
description: I served as an assistant of Data Structures & Algorithms course for two terms in the even semester. The course is about the logic in data manipulation in Java programming language for the first year students. The course assistant roles are giving lab work and assessing quizzes and examinations of the students.
